options.description: Input file file from a tRNAscan-SE search.
Output BSML file (will be created, must not exist)
The input file that was used as input for the tRNAscan-SE run
Path to the project's id repository
Optional. A non-zero value will make compressed output.
Debug level. Use a large number to turn on verbose debugging.
Required. Project ID. Used in creating feature ids. If 'aa1' is passed, repeat feature IDs created are like aa1.repeat_region.4231.1 If 'parse' is passed, will parse from already present ids.
